ELIXIR BODY REJUVENATION

REFINE YOUR SKIN
AND DEFINE YOUR BODY

X-WAVE™ - CELLULITE & CONTOUR THERAPY

ENHANCE THE TEXTURE OF YOUR SKIN

X-WAVE™ is a shockwave therapy clinically proven to treat cellulite and contour the body. This treatment works by breaking down fat under the skin and stimulating lymphatic drainage to remove excess toxins from the body. It also aids in collagen production for the skin to appear smoother, healthier, and more youthful.

What are the treatment advantages?
  • Breaks down fatty deposits and cellulite
  • Improves muscle tone
  • Smooths and rejuvenates skin
  • Tightens skin and underlying connective tissues
  • Reduces circumference of treated area
  • Increases the firmness of skin
Recommended
  • 4-6 treatments over a course of few weeks
  • Visible results after a first session
  • A great treatment when combined with ULTRA Body Tightening
Why should you do it?
Painless

Clients report minimal to no discomfort with the X-WAVE™

No Downtime

No anesthesia, No scarring, No headaches. Clients can resume daily activities right after the treatment.

Immediate results

Noticeable results right after the first treatment.

ULTRA BODY TIGHTENING

LOOK AMAZING FROM EVERY ANGLE

Combining radio frequency and ultrasound to precisely tighten skin and address body concerns from head to toe; works on even the most wrinkled and problematic areas.

This treatment uses controlled heating and cooling to ensure energy is delivered to various depths in the tissue without discomfort. Changing power and cooling during treatment process allows the provider to treat deep tissue all the way up to the superficial layer.

Recommended
  • 2-4 treatments to be scheduled 7-10 days apart
  • Treatment takes between 15-30 minutes per specific body part
  • Best results are achieved when treatment is combined with exercise.
Why should you do it?
ULTRA 360° TECHNOLOGY

360° delivery of radiofrequency and ultrasound

Ultra Safe

The unique EFC™ (Energy Flow Control) ensures the optimal level of power is delivered to the target tissue at all times; energy is being monitored and adjusted in real time.

Ultra comfort

Clients report minimal to no discomfort. You can resume daily activities immediately post-treatment.

Ultra result

Clients in many clinical studies have reported clinical body shaping and tightening results.

Laser Body Rejuvenation

LASER HAIR REDUCTION

Say goodbye to waxing and shaving with laser hair reduction! Using Nd: YAG laser for deep penetration to destroy the deepest hair follicles. Treatment is available for men and women; suitable on all skin types.

FRACTIONAL LASER

An effective treatment in reducing scars, large pores, stretch marks, fine lines and wrinkles, pigmentation and more.

VEINS & VASCULAR LESIONS

Laser treatment for removal of many types of vascular lesions such as spider veins using long-pulse Nd:YAG lasers. Penetrating to a depth of 5-6mm into the skin allowing for effective results.

VAGINAL REJUVENATION

This non-surgical procedure can be done for cosmetic reasons or to solve age-related problems, such as lack of vaginal tightness and urinary incontinence.

HYPERHIDROSIS

Many people suffer from hyperhidrosis, which is excessive sweating that commonly occurs in the palm of the hands, underarms, scalp, and other areas in the body. Discover how BOTOX™ can help reduce excessive sweating in the palms & underarms.
